review:
We met Dr. Sunita Samal at apollo women's hospital 1st week of August 2023 and she has been referred by my family Doctor Muthulakshmi for my wife uterus fibroid removal, before that I was consulted more than 10 doctors. Since uterus fibroid size is 12 cm, she was suffering a lot of pain and bleeding, many days was nightmare for us and lost sleep.
 All doctors had insisted us to do open surgery because of bigger size and not having confident with laparoscope but Dr. Sunita Samal is the first doctor given confident that can be removed by laparoscopy.  So we fix the date on 21st August after the complete medical test.  Dr. Sunita Samal did surgery without any issue, am giving this review after 3 months now. my wife is completely fine and no other complication regarding her health. 
We strongly recommending, Dr. Sunita Samal , she is excellent in profession and very friendly.

She is very good and very competi




She is very good and very helpful for me . She is guided me in very polite way .
Dr.Sunitha is too friendly and she patiently answers all your queries. Her expertise in surgical procedures is exceptional. Look no further since your in good hands.
Doctor is very calm and understanding. Listened to all my grievances patiently and dealt with them satisfactorily.

Dr. Sunita Mam was very much friendly with me thereby I could share my problems with her effectively. I feel very happy on this consultation with a very experienced and eco-frindly doctor. I will rate her service as "Excellent".

Thank you.
She is a sincere doctor. Her follow up with patients is good. She prescribes medicine, that are relevant for that disease. She councils the patient nicely

Mam is a fantabulous doctor.. She has excellent communication skill.. Her explanation to patient cures half of their ailments. She is very positive in her attitude.. 
She is very approachable.. As a patient of hers, she is my favorite..

*** ** ** ********* ****** **** very good experience. She made me comfortable with her interaction and enquiry about my problem. Found her room to be clean with proper set up of everything. Her treatment is awesome as well.
Friendly approach to deal with the patient. Very cordial and familiar approach.Doctor should behave like her.

*** ** * **** *** humble doctor. My experience was good enough. She handles every patient with all her passion and dedication. She always tries to make her pateint comfortable and makes her more positive. She deals every situation in a proper manner.
